attributes.action: Ban smoking whilst driving a vehicle on Britains Roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Smoking whilst at the wheel is as dangerous as drink driving and using a mobile phone whilst driving. I call on the Prime Minister to make it illegal to smoke whilst driving and in addition to fine people £60 who throw cigarette buts out of their car windows.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
